import.downloadBySku: Download Product Bin by SKU Sample CSV
import.downloadByLoc: Download Product Bin by SKU and Location CSV

productImport.steps: To upload the product list, please follow these steps:
productImport.stepOne: Please prepare a product list to upload in CSV format. You can use the existing template containing the required data that can be downloaded from
productImport.stepTwo: If you want to use a different template for product upload, you can change it on the
productImport.format: file format with comma-separated values. This format is required for product import. The first row is the column name and below it is the product data. For example:
productImport.selectCsv: button and select the CSV file you have been prepared before.
productImport.if: If the template file has been selected, the
productImport.deleteVisible: button will be visible and you can use it to delete the existing file selection. This action will restore the template to the default version.
productImport.openProductUpload: Open the product upload template using any supported application. The columns in this file are the minimum requirements to upload product data. You can add another column that is included in the product attribute.Also please note that only comma-separated values are supported for product upload.
productImport.selectFile: Select file for product list (.csv format) by clicking
productImport.uploading: button to upload and please wait till the process is finished. The updated product table will be updated shortly after it.

configurableProduct.steps: To import configurable products, please follow these steps:
configurableProduct.stepOne: Please prepare a product configurable list to import in a CSV format. You can use the template containing the required data that can be downloaded from
configurableProduct.stepTwo: Open the configurable product import template using any supported application. The first column is the field/column name while below it is the configurable products data. Also please note that only comma-separated values are supported for configurable product import. For example:
configurableProduct.groupExplain: SKU of the parent product for the child product entry. Leave this column empty if the entry is parent product.
configurableProduct.attSetCodeExplain: Code for attribute set that is used in the product.
configurableProduct.name: Name
configurableProduct.productTypeExplain: For parent product, the type is
configurableProduct.productTypeExplain2: while for the child product is
configurableProduct.visibilityExplain: To make the parent product visible in the search or catalog, please set the visibility to
configurableProduct.priceExplain: Product price only applies to the child product. Leave this field empty if the entry is a parent product.
configurableProduct.qtyExplain: Similar to product price, only child product that is required qty. For parent products, leave this field blank.
configurableProduct.statusExplain: Use $ to enable the product and use $ value to disable it.
configurableProduct.stepTwo2: The fields below are the product attributes that are currently used. This might be different depending on your needs.
configurableProduct.sizeExplain: Product size only used for child products. For parent products, leave this field blank.
configurableProduct.colorExplain: Same as product price, add color only in child products entry. Leave this field empty if the entry is a parent product.
configurableProduct.configVarExplain: Variation that is used for the configurable products. For example, if you use size and color in product attributes, the values for this field should be$size,color
configurableProduct.stepThree: Select the CSV file you have edited earlier by clicking
configurableProduct.stepFour2: button to upload and please wait till the process is finished. The product table with the newly added configurable products will be updated shortly after it.

productImage.steps: To upload product images, please follow these steps:
productImage.stepOne: Please prepare a product image list to upload in a CSV format. You can use the template containing the required data that can be downloaded from
productImage.stepTwo: Open the product image upload template using any supported application. The first column is the field/column name while below it is the values. Also please note that only comma-separated values are supported for product images upload. For example:
productImage.skuDescription: SKU of the product you want to upload the image to.
productImage.swatchImageDescription: Link for swatch image (small thumbnails that appear on the parent page of a product).
productImage.stepTwo3: You can add all images at once or add only specific images to one product SKU. If you only want to add a specific image, the values for the other image fields can be left blank. After that, the SWIFT OMS System will only update the product images that have a link as a value.
productImage.stepThree: Select the CSV file you edited earlier by clicking
productImage.stepFour2: button to upload and please wait till the process is finished. The product table with the newly added product images will be updated shortly after it.
